src.config.schemas.splitting¶

Classes

CVConfig(*[, val_folds, val_interval, ...])

Configuration for time-based cross-validation with groups.

CVWindowType(value)

Supported types of cross-validation window.

SimpleSplitConfig(*[, ratios])

Configuration for simple deterministic split by observation order.

SplitConfig(*[, method, cv_config, ...])

Unified configuration for data splitting strategies.

SplitIndices(*, train_indices[, ...])

Container for train/validation/test split indices.

SplitMethod(value)

Supported split methods.

SplitResult(*, group[, train_test_split, ...])

Container for all splits for a group.

TimeUnit(value)

Supported time units for interval configuration.
class src.config.schemas.splitting.CVConfig(*, val_folds=1, val_interval='7d', test_interval=None, train_interval=None, window=CVWindowType.EXPANDING, min_train_samples=1)[source]¶

Bases: BaseModel

Configuration for time-based cross-validation with groups.

Parameters:

  • val_folds (Annotated[int, Ge(ge=1)])

  • val_interval (str)

  • test_interval (str | None)

  • train_interval (str | None)

  • window (CVWindowType)

  • min_train_samples (Annotated[int, Ge(ge=1)])

val_folds¶

Number of validation folds in sequence

Type:

int

val_interval¶

Size of one validation window, e.g., ‘1d’, ‘15m’, ‘1M’

Type:

str

test_interval¶

Size of test period at the end of the series, e.g., ‘5d’, ‘12h’

Type:

Optional[str]

train_interval¶

For window=’rolling’: size of the training window

Type:

Optional[str]

window¶

Type of training window: expanding or rolling

Type:

CVWindowType

min_train_samples¶

Minimum observations in train for a valid split

Type:

int

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

classmethod validate_time_interval(value)[source]¶

Validate time interval string format and values.

Parameters:

value (str | None)

Return type:

str | None

validate_window_constraints()[source]¶

Validate constraints between window type and training interval.

Return type:

CVConfig

Bases: BaseModel

Configuration for simple deterministic split by observation order.

Parameters:

ratios (Tuple[int, int, int])

ratios¶

Ratios for train, validation, test splits (sum must be 100)

Type:

Tuple[int, int, int]

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

classmethod validate_ratios(ratios)[source]¶

Validate that ratios are valid and sum to 100.

Parameters:

ratios (Tuple[int, int, int])

Return type:

Tuple[int, int, int]

class src.config.schemas.splitting.SplitConfig(*, method=SplitMethod.CV, cv_config=None, simple_config=None)[source]¶

Bases: BaseModel

Unified configuration for data splitting strategies.

Parameters:

  • method (SplitMethod)

  • cv_config (CVConfig | None)

  • simple_config (SimpleSplitConfig | None)

method¶

Splitting method to use (cross-validation or simple split)

Type:

SplitMethod

cv_config¶

Configuration for cross-validation (required if method is ‘cv’)

Type:

Optional[CVConfig]

simple_config¶

Configuration for simple split (required if method is ‘simple’)

Type:

Optional[SimpleSplitConfig]

model_config: ClassVar[ConfigDict] = {}¶

Configuration for the model, should be a dictionary conforming to [ConfigDict][pydantic.config.ConfigDict].

validate_configuration()[source]¶

Ensure the correct configuration is provided based on the selected method.

Return type:

SplitConfig

str
